title: Four presumed dead in Marine helicopter crash in California
text:
Four presumed dead in Marine helicopter crash in California 8:47am EDT - 00:34 
All four crew members are believed to have died when a U.S. Marine helicopter crashed during a training mission in southern California Tuesday afternoon. Linda So reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
All four crew members are believed to have died when a U.S. Marine helicopter crashed during a training mission in southern California Tuesday afternoon. Linda So reports.
